data.text:
We are thrilled to announce that we have been honored with the prestigious IF Award 2024! Winning this award is not just a personal achievement, but a reflection of the collaborative efforts and support from an incredible team. Thank you to everyone who has been a part of this journey. Your support and encouragement have been invaluable! Thank you Nikolaj Tymm-Andersen from Timestone Aps for the great collaboration and Timothy Jacob Jensen from Designers Trust for bringing brands and designers together. #design #industrial #ifaward #grateful #designexcellence

We are pleased to announce the cooperation between Felix Hoffmann Design and VAUEN Vereinigte Pfeifenfabriken NÃ¼rnberg GmbH The pipe FELIX was developed for and with the legendary German pipe company Vauen, which has over 175 years of experience in the field of tobacco pipes. The unusual and sophisticated shape extends across the entire pipe and is meticulously handcrafted to perfect each pipe individually. The clear lines harmonize perfectly with the prominent silver ring, while the different color variations offer a good opportunity to underline your personal style. #productdesign #industrialdesign #design #pipe #tobaccoindustry #tobaccopipe #classicdesign

Felix Hoffmann Design and Timestone Aps Receive the German Design Award Special Mention 2024 TIMESTONE, the Danish pioneer in memorial design, wins the German Design Award Special Mention 2024 for its innovative eco-friendly gravestones. This recognition underscores TIMESTONE's commitment to pushing the boundaries of design while prioritizing environmental responsibility. The German Design Award, known for celebrating outstanding design achievements, has bestowed this special mention upon TIMESTONE for its innovative approach to memorializing loved ones. Unlike traditional monuments crafted from imported granite, TIMESTONE's gravestones are crafted from locally sourced clay, setting a new standard in sustainability within the industry. Felix Hoffmann, the german designer who played a pivotal role in the development of these eco-friendly memorials, collaborated closely with Timestone Aps and Designers Trust to bring this vision to life. The result is a harmonious fusion of innovation, elegant design, and environmental responsibility, culminating in a product that stands out in the category of "Excellent Product Design - Eco Design." We would like to say a personal thank you to Nikolaj Tymm-Andersen and Timothy Jacob Jensen for the good cooperation on this project! ðŸŽ‰

Time. Of the many design projects our family has been involved in in the past 102 years, the sustainable tombstone project, TimeStone has been one of the most exciting. Designed through the Designers Trust platform by Felix Hoffmann for TimeStone by Nikolaj Tymm-Andersen and Mikkel Tymm-Andersen. #tombstone #plaque #sustainability #environmentallyfriendly #Design #Designerstrust #danishdesign #scandinaviandesign
